quotes-data.quote: Be yourself and people will like you.
quotes-data.author: Jeff Kinney (Diary of a Wimpy Kid)

quotes-data.quote: The worst enemy to creativity is self-doubt.
quotes-data.author: Sylvia Plath (The Unabridged Journals of Sylvia Plath)

quotes-data.quote: It’s the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting.
quotes-data.author: Paulo Coelho (The Alchemist)

quotes-data.quote: But love was always something heavy for me. Something I had to carry.
quotes-data.author: Benjamin Alire Sáenz (Aristotle and Dante Discover the Secrets of the Universe)

quotes-data.quote: And it seemed to me that Dante's face was a map of the world. A world without any darkness.
quotes-data.author: Benjamin Alire Sáenz (Aristotle and Dante Discover the Secrets of the Universe)

quotes-data.quote: I had a feeling there was something wrong with me. I guess I was a mystery even to myself.
quotes-data.author: Benjamin Alire Sáenz (Aristotle and Dante Discover the Secrets of the Universe)

quotes-data.quote: All animals are equal, but some animals are more equal than others.
quotes-data.author: George Orwell (Animal Farm)

quotes-data.quote: The last to learn of gossip are the parties concerned.
quotes-data.author: Khushwant Singh (Train to Pakistan)

quotes-data.quote: Men go to far greater lengths to avoid what they fear than to obtain what they desire.
quotes-data.author: Dan Brown (The Da Vinci Code)

quotes-data.quote: By its very nature, history is always a one-sided account.
quotes-data.author: Dan Brown (The Da Vinci Code)

quotes-data.quote: What really matters is what you believe.
quotes-data.author: Dan Brown (The Da Vinci Code)

quotes-data.quote: I cannot make you understand. I cannot make anyone understand what is happening inside me. I cannot even explain it to myself.
quotes-data.author: Franz Kafka (The Metamorphosis)

quotes-data.quote: If you expect nothing from somebody you are never disappointed.
quotes-data.author: Sylvia Plath (The Bell Jar)

quotes-data.quote: I can never read all the books I want; I can never be all the people I want and live all the lives I want. I can never train myself in all the skills I want. And why do I want? I want to live and feel all the shades, tones and variations of mental and physical experience possible in my life. And I am horribly limited.
quotes-data.author: Sylvia Plath (The Unabridged Journals of Sylvia Plath)

quotes-data.quote: Most people barely know themselves. So what does it matter what they think of you?
quotes-data.author: JmStorm

quotes-data.quote: You keep a lot to yourself because its difficult to find someone who understands.
quotes-data.author: Erin Hanson

quotes-data.quote: What you seek is seeking you.
quotes-data.author: Rumi

quotes-data.quote: Yesterday I was clever, so I wanted to change the world. Today I am wise, so I am changing myself.
quotes-data.author: Rumi

quotes-data.quote: Protect yourself from your own thoughts.
quotes-data.author: Rumi

quotes-data.quote: It's your road, and yours alone.Others may walk it with you, but no one can walk it for you.
quotes-data.author: Rumi

quotes-data.quote: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
quotes-data.author: Confucius

quotes-data.quote: What we know is a drop, What we don't know is an ocean.
quotes-data.author: Isaac Newton

quotes-data.quote: Nothing in this world is difficult, but thinking makes it seem so.
quotes-data.author: Wu Cheng'en, Monkey: A Journey to the West
